::Killfest::

Killfest follows Motormaster, listening to his summary of events. A 
small smile flickers across his face as Motormaster punches Wildrider.

"I see you've been busy," he comments, his mind sorting through all 
the data that Wildrider gave.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaster nods, "Walk with me" he says, as he enters the Dark 
Avian. "As
> you may have noticed, we have a larger amount of troops since we 
last saw
> each other, and I'm in better shape," he says smiling. He then sees
> Wildrider, "Report Wildrider", Wildrider looks around, then starts 
to
> speak, "Umm, well sir, a Quintesson has arrived with the 
Terrorcons, and I
> put them all to work. The Quintesson repaired our wounded, and the
> Terrorcons are hunting down Condor" he finishes smiling a wicked 
smile, and
> he is met by a hard fist from Motormaster. The punch sends Wildrider
> soaring towards a wall. He bounces off, and rubs his face. "You 
idiot, they
> will probably rip Condor to shreds" he yells. He wasnt so much 
upset with
> Wildrider, but he was blowing off some steam. "Send Scourge and 
Cyclonus
> out to make sure the Maximal survives, Oh, and get the Quintesson 
to fix up
> your face." he finishes, disgusted with the large amounts of 
endoskeleton
> metal showing on Wildrider's face. Wildrider salutes, "Yes sir" and 
walks
> away finishing the sentence, "Your royal pain in the tail pipe." He 
leaves
> the Dark Avian to meet the rest of the robots.
> 
> Speedbreaker climbs into Astroblast, and grabs a big sheet of metal 
to
> carry out.
